Class CommonReceiverImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.khmyl.cafe.receiver.CommonReceiver
      • by.khmyl.cafe.receiver.impl.CommonReceiverImpl

  • public class CommonReceiverImpl
extends CommonReceiver
    Realizes validation of clients requests and if they are valid sends them for further processing.
